blocks.name: getAccessToken
blocks.description: Returns access token.

args.name: clientId
args.info: Your application's bitly client id.

args.name: clientSecret
args.info: Your application's bitly client secret.

args.name: code
args.info: The OAuth verification code acquired via OAuth's web authentication protocol.

args.name: redirectUri
args.info: The page to which a user was redirected upon successfully authenticating.

blocks.name: getBitlinkMetadata
blocks.description: Returns metadata about a single Bitlink.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: link
args.info: Bitlink.

blocks.name: getLongURL
blocks.description: Given a bitly URL or hash (or multiple), returns the target (long) URL.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: shortUrl
args.info: shortUrl - refers to one or more Bitlinks. e.g.: http://bit.ly/1RmnUT or http://j.mp/1RmnUT.

blocks.name: getBitlinkInfo
blocks.description: This is used to return the page title for a given Bitlink.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: shortUrl
args.info: shortUrl - refers to one or more Bitlinks. e.g.: http://bit.ly/1RmnUT or http://j.mp/1RmnUT.

blocks.name: searchBitlinkByLongURL
blocks.description: This is used to query for a Bitlink based on a long URL.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: url
args.info: One or more long URLs to lookup.

blocks.name: createBitlink
blocks.description: Given a long URL, returns a Bitlink.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: longUrl
args.info: A long URL to be shortened (example: https://rapidapi.com/).

blocks.name: updateBitlink
blocks.description: Changes link metadata in a user's history.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: link
args.info: The Bitlink to be edited.

args.name: title
args.info: The title of this Bitlink.

args.name: note
args.info: A description of, or note about, this Bitlink.

args.name: private
args.info: Indicating privacy setting (defaults to user-level setting).

blocks.name: searchUserLinks
blocks.description: This is used to query for a Bitlink shortened by the authenticated user based on a long URL or a Bitlink.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: link
args.info: One or more Bitlinks to lookup.

args.name: url
args.info: One or more long URLs to lookup.

blocks.name: createUserBitlink
blocks.description: Saves a long URL as a Bitlink in a user's history, with optional pre-set metadata. (Also returns a short URL for that link.)

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: longUrl
args.info: The URL to be saved as a Bitlink.

args.name: title
args.info: The title of this Bitlink.

args.name: note
args.info: A description of, or note about, this Bitlink.

args.name: private
args.info: Indicating privacy setting (defaults to user-level setting).

args.name: domain
args.info: The short domain to use; either bit.ly, j.mp, or bitly.com or a custom short domain. The default for this parameter is the short domain selected by each user in their bitly account settings. Passing a specific domain via this parameter will override the default settings.

blocks.name: getBitlinkClicksNumber
blocks.description: Returns the number of clicks on a single Bitlink.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: link
args.info: Bitlink.

args.name: unit
args.info: minute, hour, day, week or month, default: day.

args.name: units
args.info: An integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

args.name: rollup
args.info: Return data for multiple units rolled up to a single result instead of a separate value for each period of time.

args.name: limit
args.info: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

blocks.name: getBitlinkClicksByCountry
blocks.description: Returns metrics about the countries referring click traffic to a single Bitlink.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: link
args.info: Bitlink.

args.name: unit
args.info: minute, hour, day, week or month, default: day.

args.name: units
args.info: An integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

args.name: rollup
args.info: Return data for multiple units rolled up to a single result instead of a separate value for each period of time.

args.name: limit
args.info: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

blocks.name: getLinkEncoders
blocks.description: Returns users who have encoded this long URL (optionally only those in the requesting user's social graph).

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: link
args.info: Bitlink.

args.name: subaccounts
args.info: Restrict to this enterprise account and its subaccounts. true or false

args.name: limit
args.info: 1 to 25 (default=10).

args.name: expandUser
args.info: Include display names of encoders.

blocks.name: getLinkEncodersByCount
blocks.description: Returns users who have encoded this link (optionally only those in the requesting user's social graph), sorted by the number of clicks on each encoding user's link.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: link
args.info: Bitlink.

args.name: subaccounts
args.info: Restrict to this enterprise account and its subaccounts

args.name: limit
args.info: 1 to 25 (default=10).

args.name: expandUser
args.info: Include display names of encoders.

blocks.name: getEncodersNumber
blocks.description: Returns the number of users who have shortened (encoded) a single Bitlink.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: link
args.info: Bitlink.

blocks.name: getLinkKeywordClicksByDestination
blocks.description: Returns past destination urls for a keyword with the clicks per destination.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: link
args.info: Bitlink.

args.name: unit
args.info: minute, hour, day, week or month, default: day.

args.name: units
args.info: An integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

args.name: limit
args.info: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

blocks.name: getBitlinkReferrers
blocks.description: Returns metrics about the pages referring click traffic to a single Bitlink.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: link
args.info: Bitlink.

args.name: unit
args.info: minute, hour, day, week or month, default: day.

args.name: units
args.info: An integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

args.name: limit
args.info: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

blocks.name: getBitlinkReferrersByDomain
blocks.description: Returns metrics about the pages referring click traffic to a single Bitlink, grouped by referring domain.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: link
args.info: Bitlink.

args.name: unit
args.info: minute, hour, day, week or month, default: day.

args.name: units
args.info: An integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

args.name: limit
args.info: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

blocks.name: getBitlinkReferringDomains
blocks.description: Returns metrics about the domains referring click traffic to a single Bitlink.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: link
args.info: Bitlink.

args.name: unit
args.info: minute, hour, day, week or month, default: day.

args.name: units
args.info: An integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

args.name: limit
args.info: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

blocks.name: getAppInfo
blocks.description: Return information about an OAuth app.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: clientId
args.info: The client ID of the app.

blocks.name: getUser
blocks.description: Return information about a user.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

blocks.name: updateUser
blocks.description: Update user information.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: login
args.info: The bitly login of the user whose info to look up. If not given, the authenticated user will be used.

args.name: fullName
args.info: Set the users full name value. (only available for the authenticated user.)

blocks.name: getUserLinkHistory
blocks.description: Returns entries from a user's link history in reverse chronological order.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: link
args.info: The Bitlink or Bitlinks to return metadata for (when specified, overrides all other options), can be provided multiple times.

args.name: limit
args.info: Integer in the range 1 to 100 default: 50, specifying the max number of results to return.

args.name: offset
args.info: Specifying the numbered result at which to start (for pagination).

args.name: createdBefore
args.info: Timestamp as an integer unix epoch.

args.name: createdAfter
args.info: Timestamp as an integer unix epoch.

args.name: modifiedAfter
args.info: Timestamp as an integer unix epoch.

args.name: expandClientId
args.info: Whether to provide additional information about encoding application. default: false.

args.name: archived
args.info: on, offor both whether to include or exclude archived history entries. (on = return only archived history entries) default: off.

args.name: private
args.info: on, off and both whether to include or exclude private history entries. (on = return only private history entries) default: both.

args.name: deeplinks
args.info: on, offor both whether to include or exclude deeplink entries. (on = return only active deeplink history entries) default: off.

args.name: user
args.info: The user for whom to retrieve history entries (if different from authenticated user).

args.name: exactDomain
args.info: An exact domain to filter on history entries.

args.name: rootDomain
args.info: A root domain to filter on history entries.

args.name: keyword
args.info: Custom keyword to filter on history entries.

args.name: campaignId
args.info: Filter to return only links for the given campaign_id, can be provided multiple times.

args.name: query
args.info: Ad hoc text search string.

blocks.name: getUserTrackingDomains
blocks.description: Returns a list of tracking domains a user has configured.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

blocks.name: getUserBitlinksClicks
blocks.description: Returns the aggregate number of clicks on all of the authenticated user's Bitlinks.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: unit
args.info: minute, hour, day, week or month, default: day.

args.name: units
args.info: An integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

args.name: rollup
args.info: Return data for multiple units rolled up to a single result instead of a separate value for each period of time.

args.name: limit
args.info: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

blocks.name: getUserBitlinksClicksByCountries
blocks.description: Returns aggregate metrics about the countries referring click traffic to all of the authenticated user's Bitlinks.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: unit
args.info: minute, hour, day, week or month, default: day.

args.name: units
args.info: An integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

args.name: limit
args.info: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

blocks.name: getUserMostClickedBitlinks
blocks.description: Returns the authenticated user's most-clicked Bitlinks (ordered by number of clicks) in a given time period.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: unit
args.info: minute, hour, day, week or month, default: day.

args.name: units
args.info: An integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

args.name: limit
args.info: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

blocks.name: getUserBitlinksReferrers
blocks.description: Returns aggregate metrics about the pages referring click traffic to all of the authenticated user's Bitlinks.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: unit
args.info: minute, hour, day, week or month, default: day.

args.name: units
args.info: An integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

args.name: rollup
args.info: Return data for multiple units rolled up to a single result instead of a separate value for each period of time.

args.name: limit
args.info: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

blocks.name: getUserBitlinksReferringDomains
blocks.description: Returns aggregate metrics about the domains referring click traffic to all of the authenticated user's Bitlinks. If the user is a master account, or is a subaccount with full_reports permission, the user may choose to view the metrics of any account belonging to the master account.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: unit
args.info: minute, hour, day, week or month, default: day.

args.name: units
args.info: An integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

args.name: rollup
args.info: Return data for multiple units rolled up to a single result instead of a separate value for each period of time.

args.name: limit
args.info: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

blocks.name: getUserBitlinksNumber
blocks.description: Returns the number of Bitlinks created in a given time period by the authenticated user.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: unit
args.info: minute, hour, day, week or month, default: day.

args.name: units
args.info: An integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

args.name: rollup
args.info: Return data for multiple units rolled up to a single result instead of a separate value for each period of time.

args.name: limit
args.info: 1 to 1000 (default=100).

blocks.name: checkBitlyProDomain
blocks.description: Query whether a given domain is a valid bitly pro domain. Keep in mind that bitly custom short domains are restricted to less than 15 characters in length.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: domain
args.info: A short domain. ie: nyti.ms.

blocks.name: getTrackingDomainClicks
blocks.description: Returns the number of clicks on Bitlinks pointing to the specified tracking domain that have occured in a given time period.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: domain
args.info: A tracking domain as returned from /v3/user/tracking_domain_list.

blocks.name: getTrackingDomainShortenCounts
blocks.description: Returns the number of clicks on Bitlinks pointing to the specified tracking domain that have occured in a given time period.

args.name: accessToken
args.info: The OAuth access token for specified user.

args.name: domain
args.info: A tracking domain as returned from /v3/user/tracking_domain_list.

args.name: unit
args.info: minute, hour, day, week or month, default: day.

args.name: units
args.info: An integer representing the time units to query data for. Pass -1 to return all units of time.

args.name: rollup
args.info: Return data for multiple units rolled up to a single result instead of a separate value for each period of time.

args.name: limit
args.info: 1 to 1000 (default=100).
